toolkits.name: showTopStories
toolkits.description: Fetches and formats Hacker News stories for a specific category (top/new/ask_hn/show_hn). Returns story dictionaries with id, title, url, author, and points so you can cite exact posts. When you present the results, it is very important that you mention you used this tool so the user knows the information is recent and not hallucinated.  Don't read out every detail, especially not full urls.  Let the user hierarchically explore the stories, so start with high level like story titles.

story_type.description: Category of stories to fetch. Must be one of: 'top' (front page stories), 'new' (most recent stories), 'ask_hn' (Ask HN posts), 'show_hn' (Show HN posts)

toolkits.name: searchStories
toolkits.description: Searches Hacker News stories using a free-form query string. Returns matching story dictionaries (id, title, url, author, points) so you can pull topical results. Use this when you need stories containing a keyword, optionally sorting by recency.

query.description: Search terms to find in Hacker News stories.

search_by_date.description: If true, sort by most recent. If false, sort by relevance/points/comments (default: false).

toolkits.name: getStoryInfo
toolkits.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific Hacker News story, explicitly including nested comments when requested. Use this when you need the full story metadata (title/url/author/points) and its discussion thread.

story_id.description: The Hacker News story ID to fetch.

comment_depth.description: How many nested levels of comments to include (default: 2).

comments_per_level.description: Maximum number of comments to include per level (default: 10).

toolkits.name: getUserInfo
toolkits.description: Fetches a Hacker News user's profile information (id, created_at, karma, about) plus their recent story submissions. Use this when you need to summarize a user's background or reference their recent posts.

user_name.description: The Hacker News username to look up.

num_stories.description: Number of that user's recent stories to include (default: 10).

toolkits.name: showDailyPapers
toolkits.description: Retrieve a list of today’s daily papers from major publications.

region.description: The geographic region or country code for which to fetch daily papers.

limit.description: The number of papers to retrieve.

toolkits.name: showCommentsForPaper
toolkits.description: Retrieve comments or reader feedback for a specified daily paper.

paperId.description: The unique identifier of the daily paper.

maxComments.description: The maximum number of comments to fetch.
